title: Electric field dependent g factors of YbOH molecule
abstract:
YbOH molecule is one of the most sensitive systems for the electron electric
dipole moment ($e$EDM) searches. Zeeman splittings of the $e$EDM sensitive
levels have significant implications to control and suppress important
systematic effects due to stray magnetic field in experiments for $e$EDM
searches. The electric-field-dependent g factors of the lowest rotational level
of the first excited bending vibrational mode of $^{174}$YbOH are calculated.
l-doublet levels with small g factors difference are found and main
contributions to the difference are determined.
